name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Language Tools - Translate, Dictionary, and Thesaurus

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate, Dictionary, and Thesaurus. Use the Context Menu Options and the Toolbar Button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Set their preferred language to translate. Supports all 243 languages available with Google Translate. 
Easily search selected text on Google Dictionary and PowerThesaurus. Translate selected text and web pages using Google Translate. 

Extension by BrowserNative. Not created by or affiliated with Google or PowerThesaurus.com.
